overview: Tugce Ergul works as an Associate at Startup Labs and is the Southern Europe Manager of Startup Weekend. Tugce is also the Chapter Lead of Girls in Tech Italy, an international organization focused on the empowerment, engagement and education of women in tech. She previously worked at several investment banks before joining Startup Labs. Tugce received her undergraduate degree in Finance from Sorbonne University with honors, and holds a masterâ€™s degree in International Management from Bocconi. She actively works with startups and entrepreneurs in cities around the world and regularly speaks at events around Europe regarding entrepreneurship and startups. Tugce is an active member of the European VC network. She is fluent in English, French, Turkish, Azeri, Spanish, Italian and speaks some Portuguese.

degrees.subject: International Management - specialization in Venture Capital & Private Equity
